website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo Tab 2 A10-70 has a great display for the price, but lags behind higher-end Android tablets in terms of performance.

customer_reviews.title: Best Tablet
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I watch a lot of training videos on this tablet. Connect over SSH to remote servers. VPN use citrix for work, Teamviewer for my personal stuff and vnc home. Also have used Free pdf redaer on this read documents. MS office on this tablet by default but have not really used :s . Other then that the tablet works flawlessly Battery life with use is amazing most the time i forget to turn it off over night i,e last night it was 88% this morning it is 76% charge with veriosus apps still running. I like the Professional mode i think its called and have purchased the offical lenovo keyboard stand for this which works well.
customer_reviews.author: H. S. Bassi

customer_reviews.title: DOM'T GO THERE - TERRIBLE PRODUCT, TERRIBLE SELLER AND TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SUPPORT FROM LENOVO!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was faulty and intermittently failed to switch on from the very early days after it was opened. To cut a very long story short, the seller advised me to keep the product when it first started to work again, meaning that I am unable to get a refund as it breached the 30-day cut-off to be considered "Dead on arrival". Lenovo have failed to fix the device despite it having been sent off to them twice for repair. Now both seller and Lenovo are refusing a refund or replacement device, despite the fact that it was flagged up as being faulty within days of having receiving it. Shockingly bad customer service - just don't go there!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a Which best buy and I can definitely see why. Just like an ipad in quality but less than half the cost! Battery life is better than an ipad and weighs less. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is this actually made by Lenovo?
customer_reviews.text: I brought this tablet in June 2017 by mid August it has died plug it in and nothing happens. I actually own 3 Lenovo laptops and a Lenovo phone and never had a problem hopefully something can be done as this was my son's birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay connected
customer_reviews.text: I have had trouble with this since I bought it It won't stay on the internet for more than five minutes At first I thought it was my connection or a wifi fault with my provider but after months of frustration I have had enough My wifi Broadband etc is all-in working order as all my other devices work perfectly off it so this is definitely a faulty one and too late to do anything now so I guess I have to put it down to a big mistake if anyone out there is having the same trouble I would advise to return it quickly Don't waste time as I did
customer_reviews.author: Linda Daly

customer_reviews.title: Good allrounder
customer_reviews.text: Happy with tablet especially excellent screen. The only issue I have had is watching BBC content. Apparently there is bug which effects watching BBC video on certain devices. Hopefully this will get fixed soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lenovo
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice well priced tablet. It sets up easily,as when you sign into your Google account it automatically reloads some of the apps you had in any device you had. It will upgrade the OS also. Sound is excellent. I bought a refurbished Amazon one and it's like new.
customer_reviews.author: stano

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for personal,daily use (emails,etc) as an alternative to my laptop. Easy to set up to my liking & to use. Screen resolution is excellent,takes a fairly firm touch to the screen but not a problem. Battery life is good but is a little slow to re-charge. Very happy with my choice & would recommend this tablet to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: jsh142

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected. Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for the price. What else do I need ? It's got a terrific screen for watching movies. It's quick enough for me. Not super fast but OK. Has extra storage that you can add. It's not the lightest and thinnest out there but for the price, I think it's the best buy in a large size tablet. I did some research and found that this was the best of all of them. To me, the screen resolution is most important and nothing out there in a large size with this resolution that I could find. It even sounds OK !
customer_reviews.author: A. GRASSO

customer_reviews.title: I am very impressed with the Lenovo tablet - set-up and connected to home wi-fi easily. Very fast and pin-sharp screen
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as an Xmas present for my 10yo daughter, to replace her smaller, much slower 4 year old Samsung tablet. I am very impressed with the Lenovo tablet - set-up and connected to home wi-fi easily. Very fast and pin-sharp screen. I've downloaded several apps for it now and had no issues - watching BBC iPlayer, and the Planet Earth series has been very enjoyable. :-) My daughter loves playing all the games on there which were downloaded with no issues - such as Roblox, Candy Crush& ooVoo etc!
customer_reviews.author: Colin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tablet in December 2015 at a higher price and still running as new. Great HD quality for this price, ok it is not excellent if you view it from an angle, but it's normally in front of me. Sound is loud and clear, and I can add all the storage I want with a SD card. Also being plastic it is fairly light and I use it all the time to read my Kindle books. For this price I am totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo Donati

customer_reviews.title: Great value tablet, outstanding battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Great value tablet, the battery life is outstanding. This is the second one I have bought, now I have one for my work, and one that I can now hand over to my young son.
customer_reviews.author: Plumber & Gas man

customer_reviews.title: Good value pad
customer_reviews.text: Quite impressed so far with this tablet, placed a screen protector on it which has made typing a bit harder (,I assume it's this, I did not try the screen before adding the film),,2gb ram is needed for a speedy response, clear screen with good colouring, the speakers ARE NOT FRONT FACING as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: relaxing

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet on a budget. Amazing screen resolution. Tablet very responsive
customer_reviews.text: Received it today. So far so good. Impressed by the screen resolution! I have started to read manga with it, it renders really well. The tablet is responsive. Negative comments were about WiFi connection issues and problems after the android upgrade. I do not experience any of this. According to professional reviews, with a screen that good they had to cut the expenses somewhere else: performance. Apparently it will not cope well with demanding games. It's fine to me, I have a gaming laptop for this. I have played small games, they run very smoothly! To me it is the best low budget (-200 Eur) tablet on the market.
customer_reviews.author: fab

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet. My only annoyance is that the WiFi ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Tablet. My only annoyance is that the WiFi drops out - a lot. Having read some forums it appears to be a common 'fault' however people have updated firmware, routers, drivers and this has made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet, the screen is really clear and bright, films and games all look amazing on the big screen. The sound from the three speaker sound bar is very cool too. Plenty of apps on it and loads more to download. Syncs with my Fitbit tracker nicely. Very fast, no freezing or buffering as yet. Overall very happy and would buy again. Not much memory but a micro sd card for less than £8 adds an extra 32Gb which is plenty but it will take up to 64Gb.
customer_reviews.author: Benwright

customer_reviews.title: Have to say it is an excellent tablet for the money
customer_reviews.text: Cannot live without a tablet and after looking at so many others I took a chance on this Lenovo tablet after reading all the other reviews. Have to say it is an excellent tablet for the money. It is fast and the screen is high quality and as I do a lot of game playing the battery life is very good. I charge it every other day. Glad I took a chance.
customer_reviews.author: S P Keen

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I had been going back and forth on whether would get a tablet. In theory it has the exact same capability as your smart phone and also since I had a laptop i was unsure as to how much i would use this. I really like it and use it way more then expected. Very light compared to a laptop so easy to watch in bed. Resolution is top notch for the price. Great value for the price. Would recommend for those who want a tablet but dont need the higher end capabilities
customer_reviews.author: Liam G

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet for day to day use and the odd game.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on-time and upgrades itself to android 5 when connected to Wifi. Startup time is reasonably good. Once up and running it performs quite well. I got it on an offer Relative to the price (£120 when bought) the performance is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: G. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Could be a cheap rival to the Apple iPad4!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is excellent value for money. I paid less than £150. The performance compares very favourably with my iPad4. The battery life is better than the iPad - by a mile! The camera is good but the photos are not quite up to the iPad's, but they are still clear and sharp and I am more than happy with them. Apps are available for virtually everything - good old Android! The only downside some people might claim is the lack of Facetime. However, I understand that Android is developing (has developed?) a similar App based on DUO.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is good, lasts almost a week of armchair use (intermittent ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these to replace an iPad and a Nexus (7"). It just works! Battery life is good, lasts almost a week of armchair use (intermittent browsing, social media and email). Wireless is easy to setup, and appears quite stable. Very good display, sound is fair over the internal speakers, but great over phones.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rogan

customer_reviews.title: 10'' tablet PC
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday present for the wife, to replace the game playing on her mobile. The larger screen makes the games easier to view but has not increased her scores. It has also replaced some of the functions her laptop used to preform. The tablet PC is quick, responsive and fun to use. What's not too recommend? (her words - not mine)
customer_reviews.author: Happysoul

customer_reviews.title: I have had this tablet about a month now and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tablet about a month now and have found it does all that I need for a reasonable price. The only downside so far I have found is the length of time it takes to start up , over twice as long as my wifes Samsung tablet but that is the only downfall
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Cripps

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this device
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this device. The rumours on the updates "breaking the sound quality" are true and since then the manufacturer has pushed updates which never really fixed this. My advice, get it but don't upgrade the Android OS. Perfect tablet otherwise, battery life is exceptional (and mine was ex-demo!). Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Chalmers

customer_reviews.title: Well worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my new tablet this is the second one I have had and I love it not too heavy and I am happy with the price, Lenovo is the best make I have had.
customer_reviews.author: mrs audrey ibbotson

customer_reviews.title: User-unfriendly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a replacement for an elderly iPad, but rapidly sent it back and bought a new iPad. I now realise why the iPad equivalent is twice the price! The Lenovo tablet is so user-unfriendly, which is surprising for me, given that I have a Lenovo laptop that's very intuitive and interfaces well with Apple devices. If you don't want to use a gmail account, it will make life very difficult when trying to receive and send emails.
customer_reviews.author: Brew

customer_reviews.title: "mystical crack" on the screen
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice tablet, but few days ago a 5 inch crack appeared on the screen. The tablet was on the shell most of the time, in protective case. I did not drop it or damage in any other way. Therefor I am surprised to find that crack. Never happened before with any other electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware, Transformed with the update to android 6.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive tablet with a great screen, good battery, capable hardware. Transformed with the update to android 6. Still using it daily 18 months later
customer_reviews.author: Dicko

customer_reviews.title: Good solid laptop ang great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good solid laptop ang great value for money.Smooth screen....handy when playing darts and good clear graphics.Better than overpriced Apple and Samsungs.
customer_reviews.author: Hairy Highlander

customer_reviews.title: Still Going Strong
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tablet for my husband. He uses it occasionally and has so far been happy with its performance. It is a compact size and handy for travelling compared to a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie51

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tablet for the price. It's extremely quick and the display is very detailed and bright. Can't fault it compared to similar Android tablets I've owned. Sound quality is good, remember to adjust the Dolby settings if using headphones. Some of the audio presets can make the headphone sound distorted but it's quick and easy to change.
customer_reviews.author: BPC

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, good spec
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Kid (8 years) She loves it , Good Value , good spec , reasonably delivery, Has been dropped a few times (with protective case) and still working fine, Down side: Sound could be better from unit and takes 15-20 Sec to boot up. Reasonable camara spec, A good all round starter Tab for young kids without spending a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: Im very happy from this tablet. been looking for one for a long time, and now I found it. Good quality, working without any problems. Can easily watch movies, play games etc. worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Krzysztof

customer_reviews.title: Dolby sound system flawed on this model.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Dolby sound system doesn't work.... Numerous quotes on social media about this subject, with this tablet. Poor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen. R

customer_reviews.title: It is a good piece of equipment and is a lot cheaper than ...
customer_reviews.text: The tablet arrived within the time frame and has been used since Christmas. It is a good piece of equipment and is a lot cheaper than the brand leader iPad, the only slight drawback is it takes a little longer to start up than the iPad but otherwise it seems very good
customer_reviews.author: Alan V

customer_reviews.title: this is the 2nd tablet I purchased of this make ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the 2nd tablet I purchased of this make it did last 4 months before it stopped working which in all fairness is twice as long as the first one
customer_reviews.author: alan1

customer_reviews.title: which is an amazing machine! My grandson has an I-pad and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Having sent back an 8" Lenovo tablet and got a refund, I then ordered the 10" tablet, which is an amazing machine! My grandson has an I-pad and I think my Lenovo tablet is as good at only a third of the price! I would definitely recommend it! Buy one! JD
customer_reviews.author: JD East  Sussex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price and has memory card slot to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price and has memory card slot to increase mmory Looks more reliable than the Huddle and a lot thinner. I would recommend this as its very good quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Good screen, very good sound, good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Good screen, very good sound, good value for money. Cheap enough for a first tablet for newcomers to Android use daily without obsessing over the potential loss if its lost/damaged/stolen.
customer_reviews.author: DS, Isle of Anglesey

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with it. Great high resolution screen, and I like the auto power on/off. I marked the power button area with tipex because it's difficult to find. Be careful not to buy the low resolution models which are advertised as HD but only gives 1200x800.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy little device.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this. The HD is very good for watching movies and there are so many handy apps out there it has great "functionality" across a range of tasks. Perfect for travel where you don't require a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: D Sillars

customer_reviews.title: The Missus loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Which? said this tablet was great value for money, and they were right. The screen quality is incredible!
customer_reviews.author: RandyBoy

customer_reviews.title: great value for money.
customer_reviews.text: works pretty well for basic social media and youtube use. dont expect any updates...ever.
customer_reviews.author: JW.

customer_reviews.title: Could not find auto brightness control for the screen so ...
customer_reviews.text: Could not find auto brightness control for the screen so had to use an App to do it. It is rather bright for me on the minimum setting indoors
customer_reviews.author: Anoldfart

customer_reviews.title: Superb TABA10 2 from Lenovo
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant.. Dont waste money on the cheaper Chablets from China. The Chinese Lenova products are excellent. Very fast with a superb screen. I got mine on an Amazon offer day. But still worth it. A certain family Ipad owner, was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Essex Blues

customer_reviews.title: refuses to charge back up even after taking extremely good care of it and less than often use of ...
customer_reviews.text: Awful... dies after a few months, refuses to charge back up even after taking extremely good care of it and less than often use of it.. avoid at all costs
customer_reviews.author: C. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tablet which holds a good charge. Good screen. It is a bit heavy should you wish to use it outside. Otherwise good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Useless will not connect , no emails games useless
customer_reviews.text: I will do any thing to do with internet I bought with credit card will contact the to arrange
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Good Screen/Battery
customer_reviews.text: good tablet, good screen, seems to take a while to charge but the battery does last well, xbox controller wont work with it at all via OTG cable which if I had known may have changed my decision to buy this one
customer_reviews.author: madboy

customer_reviews.title: Big Screen Tablet for a Good price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a tablet with a big screen for a decent price and this was perfect, plus it starts up quick too!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Matthew P. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Why pay the Apple premium?
customer_reviews.text: Finally made the break from IPad. The Lenovo A10 works well, has good battery life and good image. Although I had been more at home with Apple products, I had no difficulty adapting to Android.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Good screen, good sound (for a tablet), good touch sensitivity. Great tablet for playing games on. Can't really fault it, hence the 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died within 10months of having it.
customer_reviews.text: Item stopped working in less than 10months if having it. Would not charge, would not keep a charge. Very disappointed! Problem isn't the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great high spec for a bargain price. Very pleased with the features. Good screen, plenty of storage and fab quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: First tab that I have owned, very pleased with it. Not a prolific user of technology so feeling my way round it but so far so good. Would definitely recommend it as a first " tab "
customer_reviews.author: Cwoodward

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with this purchased arrived quickly brought this tablet because ...
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this purchased arrived quickly brought this tablet because of the ratings picture/sound is crystal clear I can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Bajan Q

customer_reviews.title: screen and quality build 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Very bright screen, can't be dimmed without installing night dim app.speskers are fair sound. Very happy over all
customer_reviews.author: Adam T

customer_reviews.title: As good as my previous Samsung !
customer_reviews.text: Well I was hesitant,and although it's not got 4g I am completely satisfied - it does everything I would expect, and more really, given its price !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Also a present, which has been very well received ...
customer_reviews.text: Also a present, which has been very well received by a person who is not yet in the 21st century, so we will see. I did, personally think it is up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Turner

customer_reviews.title: excellent tablet
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is fast and all aspects appear to be excellent. good product. Delivery was fast and good.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet. My son has never been keen on ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet. My son has never been keen on a tablet, but since this one has arrived he isn't off it. The quality of the screen is excellent, it is super fast, lots of storage and apps to make use of.
customer_reviews.author: magnumfan

customer_reviews.title: Really nice screen and good android interface
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandmother as a cheap alternative to ipad, given she only wants it for Skype and facebook. Really nice screen and good android interface. A really nice budget pad.
customer_reviews.author: Rhianydd Sandford

customer_reviews.title: Great value tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is great value for the price- the specs are awesome and you wont be disappointed. This tablet will work with a SanDisk 64gb micro SD card, as long as you convert it to Fat32 format. So glad I bought this, and can't imagine any other company beating this at the same price point
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi Jiggerboo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i wanted. Amazon please put exact model ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i wanted. Amazon please put exact model name lenovo tab 2 a10-f. There is diferent model and it is hard to gues which one is the one on sale
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lenovo tab 2
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with this tablet nice clear images touch screen works very well,battery life not to bad great alround piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: REGINALD GIBSON

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed by the quality for this this price. ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed by the quality for this this price. It comes with Android 4.4 but it will update to Android 5. I will use it to watch movies on YouTube, internet browsing and play games. So far it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Ovdiu Suciu

customer_reviews.title: Very Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very Good value for money, my children love them and they are the best buys budget tablets from which report.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.IQBAL

customer_reviews.title: i like it the lenovoa10tab 10-1 inch is brilliant its everything ...
customer_reviews.text: i like it the lenovoa10tab 10-1 inch is brilliant its everything i need an i also bought a ivso case for it an i am pleased with both items would recomend them to anybody Ps i would like to thank the amazon team for sorting my problem for me they were very help full in every way an to darron at amazon well done keep up the good work thankyou phyllis
customer_reviews.author: lovellyphyllis

customer_reviews.title: Great Android tablet
customer_reviews.text: Fast and effective. Very nice display. Very happy with it. Not a lot of bloatware from Lenovo which is good
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: He was delighted with it and learning under my guidance
customer_reviews.text: Exellent value for money . Bought it for a friend who had never used pc or internet before . He was delighted with it and learning under my guidance .
customer_reviews.author: conglywal

customer_reviews.title: Parents love the gift !!
customer_reviews.text: Parents love it and very easy for them to use !!
customer_reviews.author: Londoner-Professional working woman

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for the quality/price
customer_reviews.text: I do not think there is any other tablet better than this at this price in the market. I did not want to upgrade to Lollipop but it came already upgraded however it is working flawlessly. I recommend this tablet . do not looking any further at this price .
customer_reviews.author: rozan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet a great and much cheaper alternative to the IPAD
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Christou

customer_reviews.title: Moneysaver.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy the top sellers this tablet is a real bargain, recommended by Which. I'm glad I ignored all the hype.
customer_reviews.author: colinwirral

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good display and easy to use - why waste your money on an Apple product?
customer_reviews.author: J Blenk

customer_reviews.title: Execellnt
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant for the price you looking not to spend alot of money but we ant a good tablet this is it
customer_reviews.author: Zeekill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better spec and higher resolution than the TAB. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sears

customer_reviews.title: he seems happy
customer_reviews.text: Present for friend , as discribed , he seems happy
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product - met up to standards given in "Which" reviewc
customer_reviews.author: Rita Mae Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. Chosen because it's a Which Best Buy
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, my daughter has one so I knew it was good. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: PJC

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: Cannot fault this a great tablet, be careful with the upgrade
customer_reviews.author: emwood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old is delighted with this.Very solid but light casing,clear screen,excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: cantante

customer_reviews.title: he really likes it for games and it appears to be a very good product for the
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 9 year old son, he really likes it for games and it appears to be a very good product for the money
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent for a low cost tablet. can't fault it so far. good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: john.f.brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good price and easy to use holds its charge well
customer_reviews.author: rosemarie wake

customer_reviews.title: The product if false advertising
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the tablet but the problem is this is fake this is not the Lenovo tab2 a70 no it's the much slower a30
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy and I love it
customer_reviews.text: This tablet was a Which? Best Buy and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: MrGee

customer_reviews.title: Does what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Deliver was on time and box new condition. So far the lenovo has worked as expected so very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrific value for money, reviews were 100% spot on. You'll struggle to beat this one.
customer_reviews.author: Paully

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive great android tablet A++
customer_reviews.text: Had this 3 days now, what a great purchase does everything I've asked of it and for little money compared to other models / makes
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Lenove A10 Tablet
customer_reviews.text: The Lenovo replaced my previous tablet which was a Zoostorm. This new tablet is faster,has more storage space,and a much better picture. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: John Davy

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Now runs Android 6 too! I bought this in 2016 and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Mr N

customer_reviews.title: lovely little tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely little tablet, very fast & can handle multiple apps being open at one time, pretty cheap to!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great tablet at a good price. Everything I needed from a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Careful with update.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet spoilt when I downloaded the Android 5.0.1 update, stick with 4.4 KitKat which was superb.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - very good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for money. I have been loving it... So far its good with me.. It deserve 5 stars but you know expectations sucks ;) Good in battery life and cannot comment on picture quality, speed etc.
customer_reviews.author: Venkatesh G

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. Very fast and great sound. This was bought for my 5 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet well recomended. Postage great received in 3 days on free postage.
customer_reviews.author: Guy S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Really good tablet for the money. Does everything you expect and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Mayall

product_meta.title: Lenovo Tab 2 A10-70F MTK MT8165 QC 1.50GHz 1MB) Android 4.4 2.0GB 0 10.1
product_meta.description: Have an affordable tablet you can take with you anywhere. The Lenovo TAB 2 A10 tablet shows off your personality with quad core processing power, and rich audio backed by Dolby, it will do a stellar job showing off your media as well. TAB 2 A10-70's 10 inch wide-view Full HD (1920 x 1200) IPS display offers a larger viewing area than most tablets and delivers a dazzling video experience. A multi-speaker Sound Bar enhanced with Dolby Atmos Cinematic Moving Audio delivers gorgeous sound that flows above and a
feature_bullets: Wideview IPS display - offers a clear and colourful viewing experience whether indoors or outside
Long battery life - up to 9 hours use makes it suitable for day trips and journeys
Quad Core processing - enables multitasking, delivers a smoother Android experience and eliminates stutter when playing games or HD video
Dual Cameras - take photos with the 8 MP rear camera and super selfies from the 5 MP front camera, which is also suitable for web chat with your friends
Optional Bluetooth keyboard - enhances your productivity, let's you enjoy hands-free viewing and protects your tablet when you're on the move
